AIDS.description: AIDS is a chronic, potentially life-threatening condition caused by the human immunodeficiency virus (HIV).
how_to_feel_better: Eat a balanced diet and stay active.
how_to_prevent: Practice safe sex.
Avoid sharing needles or syringes.
Get regularly tested for HIV.
AIDS.when_to_seek_help: Seek help if you develop unusual infections, extreme fatigue, or unexplained weight loss.

Acne.description: Acne is a skin condition that occurs when hair follicles become clogged with oil and dead skin cells.
how_to_feel_better: Cleanse your face gently twice a day.
how_to_prevent: Maintain a proper skincare routine.
Keep your hands off your face.
Avoid oily cosmetics.
Acne.when_to_seek_help: If over-the-counter treatments do not help or acne causes scarring.

Alcoholic hepatitis.description: Alcoholic hepatitis is inflammation of the liver caused by drinking alcohol.
how_to_prevent: Limit alcohol consumption.
Avoid binge drinking.
Seek help for alcohol addiction if needed.
Alcoholic hepatitis.when_to_seek_help: Seek medical help if you experience jaundice, abdominal pain, or vomiting blood.

Allergy.description: An allergy is an immune response to a foreign substance that’s not typically harmful to your body.
how_to_feel_better: Use air filters in your home.
how_to_prevent: Get tested for allergens.
Use hypoallergenic products.
Keep windows closed during high pollen seasons.
Allergy.when_to_seek_help: If you have trouble breathing or experience anaphylaxis, seek emergency care.

Arthritis.description: Arthritis is inflammation of one or more joints, causing pain and stiffness that can worsen with age.
how_to_feel_better: Take NSAIDs or other medications as prescribed.
how_to_prevent: Maintain a healthy weight.
Avoid joint injuries.
Stay physically active.
Arthritis.when_to_seek_help: If joint pain, swelling, or stiffness worsen or limit your daily activities.
